definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: After more than one thousand years of cultivation , the spider obtained more spirit.
sentences.chinese: 經過了一千多年的修煉，蛛蛛佛性增加了不少。

sentences.english: All living beings have the Buddha-nature; all can become Buddhas.
sentences.chinese: 一切衆生，皆有佛性，皆堪作佛。

sentences.english: This analogy explains where the Buddha-nature comes from.
sentences.chinese: 這個譬喻，是說明佛性從什麼地方來的？

sentences.english: In reality, though, she is none other than our own buddha nature.
sentences.chinese: 然而於實相中，伊喜措嘉與我們自己的佛性並無分別。

sentences.english: After a thousand years of cultivation, spider Buddha has increased enormously.
sentences.chinese: 經過了一千多年的修煉，蛛蛛佛性增加了不少。

sentences.english: Wild animals all have Buddha natures, too.
sentences.chinese: 野生動物也同樣有佛性。

sentences.english: Because the cause and the result are simultaneously born, Buddha Nature is within every human being.
sentences.chinese: 因爲因果同時產生，因此每個人都具有佛性。

sentences.english: A lack of courage keeps us from being true to our Budhha nature.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏勇氣，則讓我們無法真實面對自己的佛性。

sentences.english: One thing that you can be confident about is your Buddha nature.
sentences.chinese: 我們唯一有把握的是我們自身的佛性。

sentences.english: Part three is about the commentaries of the significance of Zhu Daosheng"s buddhata thoughts."
sentences.chinese: 第三部分簡要地評述了竺道生佛性思想的意義。

sentences.english: We all have a pure and clear Buddha-nature.
sentences.chinese: 人人本有清淨純真的佛性。

sentences.english: True harmony is when we align to our pure Buddha-nature.
sentences.chinese: 真正的和諧是由在我們達到純粹的佛性時纔有。
心是涅槃，衆生皆有佛性。

sentences.english: It is Vajra that supports and protects this mantra, which comes from our own Buddha-nature.
sentences.chinese: 本性來，它是從自己那個佛性生出來的。

sentences.english: it only hampers it. True harmony is when we align to our pure Buddha-nature.
sentences.chinese: 真正的和諧是由在我們達到純粹的佛性時纔有。

Buddha-like heart (full of compassion)/spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)
(neologism c. 2017) (coll.) chill about everything (typically used to describe young people who don't buy into aspirational society)
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
(Buddhism) to deliver all living creatures from suffering (idiom)
